languages.text: "Даже не думай, полоумная кассха, если не хочешь, чтобы к железякам в твоей угрюмой физиономии не прибавилась пара свинцовых обновок".
"Don't even think about it, you crazed kaskha, unless you want me to add a few extra bits of lead to the metal adornments on that sulky mug of yours."
languages.original_text: "Даже не думай, полоумная кассха, если не хочешь, чтобы к железякам в твоей угрюмой физиономии не прибавилась пара свинцовых обновок".

languages.text: «Ni lo pienses, kaskha desquiciada. A no ser que quieras añadir unos trocitos de plomo al metal que adorna tu deprimente cara».
languages.original_text: "Don't even think about it, you crazed kaskha, unless you want me to add a few extra bits of lead to the metal adornments on that sulky mug of yours."

traits.locale_text: «Ni lo pienses, kassha desquiciada. A no ser que quieras añadir unos trocitos de plomo al metal que adorna tu deprimente cara».

languages.text: 「命が惜しいなら、やめとけ、カスカ野郎。その気持ち悪い陰気な顔の金属飾りに、鉛のかけらを入れてやろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Don't even think about it, you crazed kaskha, unless you want me to add a few extra bits of lead to the metal adornments on that sulky mug of yours."

traits.locale_text: 「命が惜しいなら、やめとけ、カスカ野郎。その気持ち悪い陰気な顔の金属飾りに、鉛のかけらを入れてやろうか？」
「そんなことは考えるな、クソ野郎。その気持ち悪いマグカップの金属飾りに、鉛のかけらを入れてやろうか？」

languages.text: “想都别想，你这脑子有病的小贱人，除非你打算让我往你那张臭脸的金属装饰上加几颗铅弹。”
languages.original_text: "Don't even think about it, you crazed kaskha, unless you want me to add a few extra bits of lead to the metal adornments on that sulky mug of yours."

traits.locale_text: “想都别想，你这脑子有病的小贱人，除非你打算让我往你那张臭脸的金属装饰上加几颗铅弹。”
“想都别想，你这脑子有病的小贱人，除非你打算让我往你那张臭脸的金属装饰上再加几颗铅弹。”

languages.text: "Denkt nicht einmal daran, Ihr verrückte Kaskha, sonst erhaltet Ihr von mir noch ein paar Bleistücke mehr für die Metallverzierungen an Eurem unfreundlichen Mundwerk."
languages.original_text: "Don't even think about it, you crazed kaskha, unless you want me to add a few extra bits of lead to the metal adornments on that sulky mug of yours."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt nicht einmal daran, Ihr verrückte Kassha, sonst erhaltet Ihr von mir noch ein paar Bleistücke mehr für die Metallverzierungen an Eurem unfreundlichen Mundwerk."

languages.text: « N'y pensez même pas, cinglée de kaskha, ou je me ferai un plaisir d'ajouter quelques plombs de plus à la quincaillerie dont votre vilaine trogne est déjà criblée. »
languages.original_text: "Don't even think about it, you crazed kaskha, unless you want me to add a few extra bits of lead to the metal adornments on that sulky mug of yours."

traits.locale_text: « N'y pensez même pas, cinglée de kassha, ou je me ferai un plaisir d'ajouter quelques plombs de plus à la quincaillerie dont votre vilaine trogne est déjà criblée. »

languages.text: "O somurtkan suratındaki metal süslemelere birkaç parça da kurşun eklememi istemiyorsan aklından bile geçirme deli kaşka."
languages.original_text: "Don't even think about it, you crazed kaskha, unless you want me to add a few extra bits of lead to the metal adornments on that sulky mug of yours."
